ibis.ipl.support

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • ibis.ipl.support.Client

  • public class Client
extends java.lang.Object
    Convenience class to create a VirtualSocketFactory, and get the address of the server.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ibis.smartsockets.virtual.VirtualSocketFactory getFactory()
      Returns the VirtualSocketFactory.
      static Client getOrCreateClient(java.lang.String name, java.util.Properties properties, int port)
      Returns a named client.
      ibis.smartsockets.virtual.VirtualSocketAddress getServiceAddress(int port)

    • Method Detail

      • getOrCreateClient

        public static Client getOrCreateClient(java.lang.String name,
                                       java.util.Properties properties,
                                       int port)
                                throws ibis.ipl.IbisConfigurationException,
                                       java.io.IOException
        Returns a named client. Creates one if needed.
        Parameters:
        name - name of the client
        properties - properties used when client is created
        port - local port to bound client to used when client is created (0 for any free port)
        Returns:
        the client with the specified name
        Throws:
        ibis.ipl.IbisConfigurationException - if the client cannot be created due to invalid settings
        java.io.IOException - if the client cannot be created due to a SmartSockets error

      • getFactory

        public ibis.smartsockets.virtual.VirtualSocketFactory getFactory()
        Returns the VirtualSocketFactory.
        Returns:
        the socket factory.

      • getServiceAddress

        public ibis.smartsockets.virtual.VirtualSocketAddress getServiceAddress(int port)
                                                                 throws ibis.ipl.IbisConfigurationException
        Get the address of a service running on a given port.
        Parameters:
        port - the port the service is running on
        Returns:
        the address
        Throws:
        ibis.ipl.IbisConfigurationException - if the server address is unknown.
